name: WP-SmartAppBanner
author: C.Oliff

sections.description: This will allow you to quickly and easily add an iOS smart app banner to your WordPress theme. Once set it will automatically appear on every page. iOS 6 or later required to see the Smart App Banner.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the directory “wp-smartappbanner” to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Set SmartAppBanner” in the dashboard under Settings to set your banner.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Release

1.1

  • No longer displays the Smart App Banner in WP Admin
  • Fix type with the meta name
  • Changed pattern attribute and removed maxlength (so folks can add on their affiliate ID if needed)

1.1.1

  • No longer displays the Smart App Banner in WP Admin Login

1.1.2

  • Minor UI improvements to settings

1.1.3

  • Fix to app ID input

short_description: This will allow you to quickly and easily add an iOS Smart App Banner to your WordPress theme.
